title: The Science of the Soul - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/20/21
itunes:title: The Science of the Soul - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/20/21
description:
George Noory and physicist Dr. Claude Swanson explore his efforts to find proof of the human soul, whether reincarnation of the soul is possible after death, and if Heaven and Hell truly exist.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
